contents: Article 13 (Chairman) ① The chairman of the general meeting shall be the head of the city/provincial sports council (hereinafter referred to as *chairman). However, when the Chairman is unable to perform his duties due to unavoidable reasons, the order determined by the Chairman when electing the Vice President or, if there is no such order, the seniority among the Vice Presidents becomes the Chairman. Revised on October 6, 2021 [Moved from Article 14 on February 4, 2021] ② In the case of a general meeting convened pursuant to Article 14 (3), the director, representative or auditor who requested the convening of the general meeting (multiple auditors) If the general meeting is convened by joint names), the elder or auditor becomes the person with the authority to convene the general meeting, and the chairman is elected from among the present delegates by the elder among the attending delegates. Newly established 2021. 10. 6.
